column1: 334|SAP Business Analyst for Source to Pay (STP)|"Description

There will be data migration activity from old system to new system. Also To design SAP procurement process for scrap generation during production process & support. They will be working with the suppliers to ensure they are on track for the rollout and test directly with them. They will be responsible for production support and testing activity.
